#Install packages
```{r}

```

#Load in librarys
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Open data file
```{r}
#This is the transcriptome we will align too
raw_data <- read_excel("Copy of DMCs_Dryad.xlsx")
```

###Look at dimensions of the files
```{r}
#Analyze the raw_data file
head(raw_data)
dim(raw_data)
str(raw_data)
```

#Make Figure 2a
```{r}
fig_two_a <- (ggplot(raw_data, aes(x = Chr_Position)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  labs(x = "Altitude", y = "Log10 DMC Count") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  ggtitle("Figure 2a") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)))

print(fig_two_a)
pdf("Plots/fig_two_a.pdf")
```
